Unique, leak-proof pressurized valve system, engineered for safety and long life, so you''ll always be ready for your next ride

See product description below for vehicle fitment or to verify fitment for your specific vehicle, please contact us, and provide us with your VIN that can be found on your vehicle or your insurance card
Unique, leak-proof pressurized valve system, engineered for safety and long life, so you'll always be ready for your next ride
body.description: You’ve planned for weeks - packed all the essentials and have your route carefully selected and finally the day has arrived for your big ride. But when you go to turn key you’re greeted with a dull growl. When it comes time to replace the battery in your Polaris vehicle don’t settle for some knock-off at your local auto parts store, get maximum cranking power and a perfect fit with a genuine Polaris replacement. This battery features a unique, leak-proof pressurized valve system, engineered for safety and long life, so you''ll always be ready for your next ride. This Accessory is Designed to Fit the Following: 2019 Sportsman 450 HO, 2019 Sportsman 570 6x6, 2019 Sportsman 570 --, 2019 Sportsman 570 --, 2019 Sportsman X2 570 EPS, 2019 Sportsman 570 EPS, 2019 Sportsman SP 570 --, 2019 Sportsman SP 570 Touring, 2019 Sportsman X2 570 EPS, 2019 Sportsman 570 Touring EPS, 2019 Sportsman X2 570 EPS, 2018 Sportsman 570 6x6 Big Boss EPS, 2018 Sportsman 570 6x6 Big Boss EPS, 2018 ACE 570 EPS, 2018 Ranger EV Li-Ion, 2018 Sportsman 450 HO, 2018 Sportsman 570 --, 2018 Sportsman 570 --, 2018 Sportsman 570 --, 2018 Sportsman 570 EPS, 2018 Sportsman 570 --, 2018 Sportsman SP 570 Touring, 2018 Sportsman X2 570 EPS, 2018 Sportsman 570 Touring, 2017 Sportsman 570 6x6 Big Boss EPS, 2017 Sportsman 570 6x6 Big Boss EPS, 2017 Ranger EV Li-Ion Pursuit Camo, 2017 Sportsman 450 HO, 2017 Sportsman 570 --, 2017 Sportsman 570 --, 2017 Sportsman 570 --, 2017 Sportsman 570 --, 2017 Sportsman X2 570 EPS, 2017 Sportsman 570 EPS, 2017 Sportsman 570 EPS, 2017 Sportsman SP 570 --, 2017 Sportsman SP 570 Touring, 2017 Sportsman 570 Touring, 2017 Sportsman 570 --, 2017 Sportsman X2 570 EPS, 2017 Sportsman X2 570 EPS, 2017 Sportsman 570 --, 2017 Sportsman 570 Touring EPS, 2016 Sportsman 450 HO, 2016 Ranger EV Li-Ion, 2016 Sportsman 450 HO, 2016 Sportsman 570 --, 2016 Sportsman 570 --, 2016 Sportsman 570 --, 2016 Sportsman 570 --, 2016 Sportsman 570 --, 2016 Sportsman 570 --, 2016 Sportsman 570 EPS

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 113 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fixed all the problems with my Polaris 4 wheeler
reviews.reviewText: Had all kind of problems with my 2018, 550 Sportsman Polaris. Seemed like the starter was bad. Turned the engine sometimes, other times, not. It was the factory battery the entire time. Replaced with this battery, never another hesitation on the starter. Never had another issue with starting my four wheeler.Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great with a 2020 Polaris 450 H.O.
reviews.reviewText: I used this as a replacement for my 2020 Polaris Sportsman 450 H.O. OEM battery. Amazon claims it’s not for this ATV but it fits perfect. The ATV starts easily, and other problems solved such as the time displays correctly, and my check engine light is off. A little pricey but worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits 2020 Sportsman 450 HO even though Amazon says it wont.
reviews.reviewText: This is the oem replacement for my 2020 Polaris Sportsman 450 HO. Amazon claims it will not work but fits perfect and now my check engine light is off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t mess with off brands- get this one
reviews.reviewText: I had all kinds of check engine light problems with Interstate Battery. Went back to polaris battery and solved my problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Batteries never last forever but 2.5 years was better by as much as a year than the other batteries I have used. So I am happy with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was just what I needed and great service

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Faulty and No support
reviews.reviewText: I received this "new" battery in faulty condition. When trying to get help via the seller and Amazon, I got the circle of finger pointing with no real help. Battery is dead at a fault level so a normal charger will not even charge. Luckily I found someone to repair Battery so it can be charged. Horrible experience!
